viewData.name: Dell 17.3" Inspiron 17 5000 Series Notebook
viewData.short_description: Buy Dell 17.3" Inspiron 17 5000 Series Notebook featuring 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8550U Quad-Core, 16GB DDR4 RAM | 2TB HDD | 256GB SSD 17.3" 1920 x 1080 Anti-Glare IPS Display. Review Dell 17 5000
viewData.long_description: The 17.3" Inspiron 17 5000 Series Notebook from Dell is designed to entertain the whole family, with a sleek finish, expansive display, and an array of features. Powered by a 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8550U Quad-Core processor and 16GB of 2400 MHz DDR4 RAM, it lets you efficiently multitask as well as quickly access frequently used files and programs. When you need more computing power, the CPU's core clock can reach a boost frequency of 4.0 GHz and the memory can be upgraded to 32GB. Its 17.3" display, driven by dedicated AMD Radeon 530 chipset with 4GB of GDDR5 graphics memory, has a Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution for crisp and clear content reproduction. An integrated HDMI 1.4b port can be used to output video to an external display. For storage, this system is equipped with a 256GB solid-state drive along with a 2TB 5400 rpm SATA III 2.5" hard drive that provides you with ample room for all your pictures, movies, data, and programs. Should you need more, you can connect external storage devices using its two USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports and one USB 2.0 Type-A port, as well as one USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-C port, which supports Power Delivery and DisplayPort.  To connect to the internet, you can use its 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi or the 10/100 Fast Ethernet port for a more reliable and stable wired connection. Pair additional compatible wireless peripherals and accessories using Bluetooth 4.1 technology to save its USB ports for other devices. Other integrated features include a SuperMulti DVD drive, an SD/SDHC/SDXC card reader, a 720 webcam, stereo speakers, and dual integrated microphones. Included is a 45W AC adapter and a power cord. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Home (64-bit).
